meanings.definition: Consisting of or relating to seven.
meanings.sent1: The septenary rainbow had seven beautiful colors.
meanings.sent2: The septenary dice set had seven sides each.
meanings.sent3: The septenary cake was decorated with seven candles.
meanings.sent4: The septenary stars in the sky shone brightly.
meanings.sent5: The septenary days of the week passed quickly.

meanings.definition: A group or set of seven things.
meanings.sent1: She bought a septenary of colorful balloons for the party.
meanings.sent2: The music band consisted of a septenary of talented musicians.
meanings.sent3: The septenary of puppies played joyfully in the park.
meanings.sent4: The septenary of books on the shelf caught her eye.
meanings.sent5: The septenary of planets in the solar system amazed the students.

meanings.sent1: The septenary marked the completion of their journey.
meanings.sent2: The septenary brought many changes to the small town.
meanings.sent3: The septenary of bad luck finally came to an end.
meanings.sent4: The septenary of droughts devastated the crops.
meanings.sent5: The septenary of peace was celebrated by all the nations.
